install.name: EwayNZ Gateway Payments
install.author: RedTeam
install.description: This plugin enables standard EwayNZ Gateway payments

param.name: pagetitle
param.label: Page Title :
param.description: This is value will be displayed as the title of the browser. Default: eWAY Hosted Payment Page.

param.name: pagedescription
param.label: Page Description :
param.description: This value will be displayed above the Transaction Details.Default: Blank.

param.name: pagefooter
param.label: Page Footer :
param.description: This value will be displayed below the Transaction Details.

param.name: companylogo
param.label: Company Logo :
param.description: The url of the image can be hosted on the merchants website and pass the secure https:// path of the image to be displayed at the top of the website. This is the top image block on the webpage and is restricted to 960px X 65px. A default secure image is used if none is supplied.

param.name: pagebanner
param.label: Page Banner :
param.description: The url of the image can be hosted on the merchants website and pass the secure https:// path of the image to be displayed at the top of the website. This is the second image block on the webpage and is restricted to 960px X 65px. A default secure image is used if none is supplied.

param.name: verify_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Order Status for successful transactions
param.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction was successful.

param.name: invalid_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Order Status for failed transactions
param.description: Select an order status for failed payment transactions.

param.name: economic_design_layout
param.label: Enter E-conomic Design and Layout ID
